description: Preventing unauthorized exfiltration of sensitive corporate data as part of the Data Loss Prevention (Windows) team.

highlights: Contributed to Intel SGX Gramine to secure confidential computing workloads (PyTorch, OpenVINO, MySQL, Redis), addressing memory faults and expanding distro support.
Implemented Intel SGX fuzzing framework resulted in 8+ vulnerability discoveries in Intel SGX TCB with 97% branch coverage.
Engineered Intel TDX full-disk encryption (FDE) solution supporting multi-VM launch, optimizing image sizes by 30%.
Led creation of CentOS Virtualization SIG attestation guides for Intel TDX.
Integrated Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) with Intel SGX via Crypto API Toolkit.
Enhanced LLM Adversarial Robustness Toolkit for evaluating LLM robustness.
Conducted comprehensive vLLM benchmarking comparing legacy VMs vs Intel TDX Trusted Domains.
Collaborated with FIDO Device Onboarding (FDO) team for Zero-Touch Provisioning of Intel Edge Devices.
Modernized cryptographic security architecture by implementing OpenSSL 3.0 migration.
Designed and implemented a POC of Bare Metal Onboarding (BMO) with real-time status monitoring in React.
